amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Defense to conduct a feasibility study on the removal of oil from sunken World War II vessels in waters near the Federated States of Micronesia and the Republic of Palau.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3015 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3015 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3748. To require the Secretary of Defense to conduct a feasibility study on the removal of oil from sunken World War II vessels in waters near the Federated States of Micronesia and the Republic of Palau.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3015 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3015 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
